name: Arrow Beats ver.0.02
description:
WARNING: THIS IS THE TRASHEST THING YOULL EVER SEE, TRY NOT TO DIE OF CRINGE

A rythm game made with scratch, yes you heard that right, scratch (not top priority just a fun thing to do so dont expect many updates)

Controls: DFJK or Arrow Keys

Use Cursor to interact with buttons.

Thats it lol
